snippet: A Navy enlisted man was charged in a complaint unsealed Thursday with accepting $1,000-a-month in cash, trips and consumer electronics for supplying a Malaysian contractor with sensitive Navy ship schedules.
abstract: Navy enlisted man Dan Layug is charged with accepting $1,000-a-month in cash, trips and consumer electronics for supplying Malaysian contractor Leonard Glenn Francis with sensitive Navy ship schedules.
lead_paragraph: A Navy enlisted man was charged in a complaint unsealed Thursday with accepting $1,000-a-month in cash, trips and consumer electronics for supplying a Malaysian contractor with sensitive Navy ship schedules.

headline.main: Another Charge in Navy Bribe Case
headline.print_headline: Another Charge in Navy Bribe Case

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
